$  Str,
$  Changed

Function processes macro 'tree_control'.

array( Processed string , Was the string changed ).

Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.

Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 188 of file jstree.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'tree_control' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              $Selector = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'selector' , false );
                              if( $Selector === false )
                              {
                                    $PackagePath = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 'jstree' , get_package_version_s( __CLASS__ ) );
                                    $this->PageComposerUtilities->add_javascript( 
                                          "{http_host}/$PackagePath/include/js/jquery.jstree.autorun.default.js"
                                    );
                                    $Control = '';
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $Control = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'tree_control.tpl' );
                                    $Control = str_replace( '{selector}' , $Selector );
                              }
                              $Str = str_replace( "{tree_control:$MacroParameters}" , $Control , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $Options->get_setting( 'tree_control' , false ) )
                        {
                              $ComponentHTML = '{tree_control:'.$Options->get_all_settings().'}';
                              $Changed = false;
                              $ComponentHTML = $this->process_string( $Options , $ComponentHTML , $Changed );
                              return( $ComponentHTML );
                        }
                        
                        if( $Options->get_setting( 'tree_control_buttons' , false ) )
                        {
                              $ComponentHTML = '{tree_control_buttons:'.$Options->get_all_settings().'}';
                              $Changed = false;
                              $ComponentHTML = $this->process_string( $Options , $ComponentHTML , $Changed );
                              return( $ComponentHTML );
                        }
                        
                        return( '' );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
